plot outline: Widower Jagdish Sardesai is respected lawyer of Kolhapur due to his busy work schedule he decides never to marry again which leaves his daughter Savitri (Savi) alone.Savi is a topper in school but lives lonely without love of her father.One day Jagdish suddenly comes home with his second wife Amla (Ammi) a simple looking women whose few years older to Savi.Ammi and Savi develop a good bond between them but Savi can't get over her father and decides to leave for Mumbai for further studies and makes her career out there.Few years later Ammi comes to Mumbai and gives the news that her father has passed away and for rest of her life they will have to live together.But Jagdish had reason to marry Ammi and Ammi has reason to live with Savi.
title: Aamhi Doghi
plot: _Aamhi Doghi_ (qv) is about the relationships of today's women.

Widower Jagdish Sardesai is respected lawyer of Kolhapur due to his busy work schedule he decides never to marry again which leaves his daughter Savitri (Savi) alone.Savi is a topper in school but lives lonely without love of her father.One day Jagdish suddenly comes home with his second wife Amla (Ammi) a simple looking women whose few years older to Savi.Ammi and Savi develop a good bond between them but Savi can't get over her father and decides to leave for Mumbai for further studies and makes her career out there.Few years later Ammi comes to Mumbai and gives the news that her father has passed away and for rest of her life they will have to live together.But Jagdish had reason to marry Ammi and Ammi has reason to live with Savi.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
